page.title: 03TEENAGERS IN GUILDFORD
page.content: Guildford is a very enjoyable place to live for today's teenagers. There are many different activities available for leisure, sport and entertainment. Places to go to include the Sports Centre, for the energetic, and the Lido, an open-air swimming pool, which proves extremely popular in the summer The Civic Hall offers a variety of concerts, from pop to classical music, and holds a regular disco. In Guildford, we see a number of different fashions worn. The trend this summer is for vivid flowered apparel; these patterns are seen on everything from croptops to socks. Skirts are worn longer this summer; these are at their best when teamed with huge shirts and thick belts. Louise Burnett and Claire Cornish
